question: Has Lionel Messi ever won the UEFA Champions League? If so, when did he first win it?
answer: Yes, Lionel Messi first won the UEFA Champions League in the 2005–06 season with Barcelona.

question: What major individual awards has Lionel Messi received, and in which years were they awarded?
answer: Lionel Messi has received the following major individual awards: Ballon d'Or (2009, 2010, 2011, 2012, 2015, 2019, 2021, 2023), FIFA World Player of the Year/FIFA Ballon d'Or/The Best FIFA Men's Player (2009, 2010, 2011, 2012, 2015, 2019, 2022, 2023), European Golden Shoe (2009–10, 2011–12, 2012–13, 2016–17, 2017–18, 2018–19), FIFA World Cup Golden Ball (2014, 2022), UEFA Men's Player of the Year Award (2010–11, 2014–15), FIFA U-20 World Cup Golden Ball (2005), FIFA U-20 World Cup Golden Boot (2005), Copa América Golden Ball (2015, 2021), Copa América Golden Boot (2021), Laureus World Sportsman of the Year (2020, 2023), TIME Athlete of the Year (2023).

question: What major individual awards has Cristiano Ronaldo received, and in which years were they awarded?
answer: Cristiano Ronaldo has received the Ballon d'Or/FIFA Ballon d'Or in 2008, 2013, 2014, 2016, and 2017; FIFA World Player of the Year in 2008; The Best FIFA Men's Player in 2016 and 2017; UEFA Men's Player of the Year in 2013-14, 2015-16, and 2016-17; European Golden Shoe in 2007-08, 2010-11, 2013-14, and 2014-15; FIFA Puskás Award in 2009; UEFA Club Footballer of the Year in 2007-08; and UEFA Champions League top scorer multiple times.

question: What major individual awards has LeBron James received, and in which years were they awarded?
answer: LeBron James has received major individual awards including 4 NBA MVP awards (2009, 2010, 2012, 2013), 4 NBA Finals MVP awards (2012, 2013, 2016, 2020), and the NBA Rookie of the Year award (2004).

question: What major individual awards has Serena Williams received, and in which years were they awarded?
answer: Serena Williams has received major individual awards including WTA Newcomer of the Year (1998), WTA Most Improved Player of the Year (1999), WTA Doubles Team of the Year (2000, with Venus Williams), and Forbes The World's Highest-Paid Female Athlete (multiple years, including 2017). She also holds 23 Grand Slam singles titles and four Olympic gold medals.

question: What major individual awards has Novak Djokovic received, and in which years were they awarded?
answer: Novak Djokovic has received the Laureus World Sportsman of the Year award in 2011, 2015, 2016, 2019, and 2024, and the Best Male Tennis Player ESPY Award in 2012.

question: What major individual awards has Tom Brady received, and in which years were they awarded?
answer: Tom Brady has received 3 NFL MVP awards (2007, 2010, 2017), 5 Super Bowl MVP awards (2002, 2004, 2015, 2017, 2021), 2 Offensive Player of the Year awards (2007, 2010), and 1 Comeback Player of the Year award (2009).

question: What major individual awards has Simone Biles received, and in which years were they awarded?
answer: Simone Biles has received the Presidential Medal of Freedom in 2022.

question: What major individual awards has Rafael Nadal received, and in which years were they awarded?
answer: Rafael Nadal has received major individual awards including 5x ATP Player of the Year, 5x Stefan Edberg Sportsmanship Award, 1x Fans' Favourite Award, 1x Comeback Player of the Year, and the Prince of Asturias Award in 2008.

question: What major individual awards has Lewis Hamilton received, and in which years were they awarded?
answer: Lewis Hamilton has received the following major individual awards: F1 World Drivers' Champion (2008, 2014, 2015, 2017, 2018, 2019, 2020), Hawthorn Memorial Trophy (2015), FIA Pole Trophy (2015), and Knighthood (2020).

question: What major individual awards has Naomi Osaka received, and in which years were they awarded?
answer: Naomi Osaka has received the following major individual awards: WTA Newcomer of the Year (2016), Laureus Breakthrough of the Year (2019), AP Female Athlete of the Year (2020), and Laureus Sportswoman of the Year (2021).

question: What is the highest league finish achieved by Manchester United, and in which season did it occur?
answer: Manchester United achieved their highest league finish by winning the Premier League title in the 2012–13 season.

question: What is the highest league finish achieved by Liverpool, and in which season did it occur?
answer: Liverpool achieved their highest league finish by winning the Premier League in the 2024–25 season.

question: What is the highest league finish achieved by Arsenal, and in which season did it occur?
answer: The highest league finish achieved by Arsenal was first place in the 2003–04 Premier League season.

question: What is the highest league finish achieved by Chelsea, and in which season did it occur?
answer: Chelsea's highest league finish was 1st in the Premier League, achieved in the 2004–05 season.

question: What is the highest league finish achieved by Manchester City, and in which season did it occur?
answer: Manchester City achieved their highest league finish by winning the Premier League title in the 2022–23 season.

question: What is the highest league finish achieved by Tottenham Hotspur, and in which season did it occur?
answer: The highest league finish achieved by Tottenham Hotspur is 1st in the First Division, which occurred in the 1950–51 and 1960–61 seasons.

question: What is the highest league finish achieved by Leicester City, and in which season did it occur?
answer: Leicester City achieved their highest league finish by winning the Premier League in the 2015-16 season.

question: What is the highest league finish achieved by Everton, and in which season did it occur?
answer: Everton achieved their highest league finish as 1st in the First Division during the seasons 1890–91, 1914–15, 1927–28, 1931–32, 1938–39, 1962–63, 1969–70, 1984–85, and 1986–87.

question: What is the highest league finish achieved by Newcastle United, and in which season did it occur?
answer: The highest league finish achieved by Newcastle United is 1st place in the First Division/Premier League, which occurred in the seasons 1904–05, 1906–07, 1908–09, and 1926–27.

question: What is the highest league finish achieved by Aston Villa, and in which season did it occur?
answer: The highest league finish achieved by Aston Villa was 1st in the Football League First Division, which occurred in the 1980–81 season.
